grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 声誉【セイヨ】reputation, fame, credit, honor and distinction, honour and distinction
毀誉【キヨ】praise and censure, approval and disapproval, approbation and condemnation
kun reading compounds: 誉れ高い【ほまれたかい】renowned, famous
褒める【ほめる】to praise, to admire, to speak well of someone
